text: Edgecliff Village is a town in the U.S. state of Texas. The hamlet of Edgecliff Village is enjoying a growth boom, as the remaining 206 acres (0.8 km2) of open grassland being developed for building single-family houses. After this area is filled out, there is little open ground for housing in the town. The Hunt family of Texas owned and leased this land for many years. Category:Towns in Texas Category:Settlements in Tarrant County, Texas
title: Edgecliff Village, Texas
